description: An envTemeratureNotification is sent if the
environmental monitoring detects that the temperature
is at a critical state. This may cause the system to
shut down. This notification is sent only if
envEnableTemperatureNotification is set to true.
The index to access an entry in the table.
variables.name: TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envTempSensorUnitIndex

description: The current value of the temperature sensor.
variables.name: TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envTempSensorValue

description: The current state of the temperature sensor.
variables.name: TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envTempSensorState

description: An envFanNotification is sent if the environmental
monitoring detects that a fan is in a critical state.
This may cause the system to shut down. This
notification is sent only if envEnableFanNotification
is set to true.
The index to access an entry in the table.
variables.name: TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envFanUnitIndex

description: The current state of fan 0, normal/fail.
variables.name: TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envFanState

description: An envPowerNotification is sent if the environmental
monitoring detects that a power supply has changed status.
This notification is sent only if
envEnablePowerNotification is set to true.

event.Summary: Power supply 1 is down. Fail count: $v1

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envPowerSupply1DownNotification TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envPwrsupPowerFailCount i 9999 TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envPwrsupIndex i 1 TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envPwrsupInstalled i 1 TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envPwrsupStatus i 1 TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envPwrsupType i 1 TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envPwrsupUptime i 9999 TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envPwrsupDowntime i 9999

since boot-up.

description: Seconds since power supply came up.

description: Seconds since power supply went down.
variables.name: TIARA-NETWORKS-ENVIRONMENT-MIB::envPwrsupDowntime
